website_summaries.verdict: Ralph Lauren stands out for making high-quality fashions, and these stylish trouser socks are no exception.
pros: Crafted of cotton combined with nylon and spandex for a stylish look and comfortable fit
Pack of three includes solid, tweed, and chevron patterns
cons: Material isn't as soft as expected

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks, they stay soft (even after multiple washings/dryings), don't shrink or pill, are comfy and stay up. Can't believe I'm reviewing socks, but I've had tons of socks that have shrunk or become scratchy after washing and drying. These have really held up well and remain soft and comfortable. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: AmazUser

customer_reviews.title: Confy and good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent I bought it as a Xmas gift and I end up keeping it
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as discribed.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, stylish, exactly what I wanted for my equestrian boots.
customer_reviews.author: submissann

customer_reviews.title: My only socks
customer_reviews.text: They shrink a bit over time and become less silky, more cottony, but that doesn't bother me because they look great and are the only socks that don't have holes in them after 2 years! They work perfectly with my Doc Martens.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, long lasting, second time I’ve bought these for someone.
customer_reviews.author: rockin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks, hard to find socks with 64% cotton in them anymore!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kat4u2

customer_reviews.title: Top of sock to small
customer_reviews.text: The top of socks were tight, I think if you were a trim person they would work just fine, the top measures at 3" inches.
customer_reviews.author: Janny H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! They look great and they stay up without binding.
customer_reviews.author: K. Price

customer_reviews.title: Much too large for women!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so big I have a hard time believing they are for women! They are nice socks so I gave them to my husband who wears a size 13 shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Shepmom

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good option
customer_reviews.text: These are actually pretty good socks. They stay up pretty well and the texture of the fabric is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Shrink like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I could have washed them by hand, but I find that too much trouble for casual socks. With machine washing, they shrank so that it’s a bit of a struggle to pull them on. They were not very generously sized straight out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineSharon

customer_reviews.title: What color is tobacco brown?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a medium tweed/heather brown sock. What I received is a VERY light brown sock that I would wear with a khaki colored pant, not the medium brown jeans that I have. The color shown is NOT representative of the socks that I received. Of the three socks shown the middle sock looks like a medium brown, It is NOT! The color description and the color shown on the monitor DO NOT represent the color of tobacco.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely trouser socks
customer_reviews.text: When it was below zero here this winter I was looking for warm and cozy socks that look good and hold up. These socks fit the bill except for the cozy part. I thought the photo made them look fuzzy and warm. They are regular socks - though very good quality. If you want these for freezy winter days, you'll have to put your slippers on!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fox

product_meta.title: Lauren Ralph Lauren Tweed Cotton Trouser Socks - 3 Pair Pack (34004)
product_meta.description: The Lauren Ralph Lauren Tweed Cotton Trouser Socks - 3 Pair Pack 34004 includes a tweed pair of socks, chevron pattern pair or socks and solid pair of socks. Lauren Ralph Lauren's Tweed Cotton Trouser Socks - 3 Pair Pack features socks with embroidered logo at top, seamed toes and reinforced heels.
feature_bullets: Care: Machine wash cold. Do NOT bleach. Tumble dry low.
